data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 1, Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 3, LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Ismail Elfath signals a Los Angeles throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Los Angeles's Eddie Segura misses with an attempt on goal.
Ismail Elfath awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
In the minute 11, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 11, Los Angeles have a goal kick.
Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Ismail Elfath signals a Los Angeles throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 14, In Los Angeles Los Angeles attack through Mark Anthony Kaye. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Ethan Zubak for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of LA Galaxy.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Los Angeles to check on Diego Palacios, who is grimacing with pain.
Los Angeles push forward at Banc of California Stadium and Mark Anthony Kaye gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined LA Galaxy defence.
In the minute 19, Diego Palacios is back on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 21, Los Angeles needs to be cautious. LA Galaxy have an attacking throw-in.
Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 22, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
In the minute 24, In Los Angeles, Los Angeles push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
LA Galaxy move into a 0-1 lead through a Ethan Zubak header.
In the minute 26, That's a fine assist from Julian Araujo.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 28, Can Los Angeles capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Los Angeles are coming forward and Brian Rodriguez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ismail Elfath awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Los Angeles Los Angeles drive forward through Diego Rossi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
LA Galaxy's Ethan Zubak gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Banc of California Stadium.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of LA Galaxy.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Free kick Los Angeles.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
In the minute 41, Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon breaks free at Banc of California Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
LA Galaxy drive upfield and Cristian Pavon gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Los Angeles defender.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Ismail Elfath signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
LA Galaxy’s Sebastian Lletget is on his feet again at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Banc of California Stadium.
Ismail Elfath waits before resuming play because Sebastian Lletget for LA Galaxy is still down.
The second-half is underway at Banc of California Stadium.
Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
Bradley Wright-Phillips is on a sub for Brian Rodriguez for Los Angeles.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Dejan Jakovic with Jose Cifuentes. This is the second substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 47, LA Galaxy have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 49, Free kick Los Angeles.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Tristan Blackmon is booked for the home team.
Ismail Elfath signals a Los Angeles throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Los Angeles are pushing forward but Diego Rossi's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
It's now 0-2 in Los Angeles as Sebastian Lletget scores for LA Galaxy.
In the minute 54, Julian Araujo with an assist there.
In Los Angeles, Carlos Vela of Los Angeles is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Los Angeles in Los Angeles.
In the minute 57, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Carlos Vela.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
Carlos Vela (Los Angeles) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Adrien Perez.
In the minute 59, LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon is on target but unsuccessful.
Adrien Perez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Los Angeles.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Cristian Pavon of LA Galaxy smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 62, Ethan Zubak of LA Galaxy gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
Ismail Elfath awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Los Angeles to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 65, Bob Bradley is making the team's fourth substitution at Banc of California Stadium with Mohammed El Munir replacing Diego Palacios.
The home team replace Francisco Ginella with Bryce Duke.
Jonathan Dos Santos is replacing Ethan Zubak for the away team.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of LA Galaxy.
Perry Kitchen (LA Galaxy) has received a yellow card from Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 69, Ismail Elfath signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to LA Galaxy's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Los Angeles in Los Angeles.
Free kick in a good position for Los Angeles!
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of LA Galaxy.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
In the minute 72, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Los Angeles's Bradley Wright-Phillips is whistled for offside at Banc of California Stadium.
LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon gets in a shot on goal at Banc of California Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Julian Araujo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Julian Araujo, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Efrain Alvarez is the substitute for LA Galaxy.
In the minute 77, LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 79, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
Los Angeles are coming forward and Adrien Perez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Sebastian Lletget for LA Galaxy drives towards goal at Banc of California Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 81, Jonathan Dos Santos of LA Galaxy gets in a strike, but is off target.
Los Angeles have a goal kick.
Los Angeles drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 82, LA Galaxy make their third substitution with Sacha Kljestan replacing Sebastian Lletget.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Los Angeles are pushing forward but Diego Rossi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 84, Ismail Elfath awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
In the minute 88, Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon gets in a shot on goal at Banc of California Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Los Angeles's half?
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Jose Cifuentes's header is off-target for Los Angeles.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Banc of California Stadium.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of LA Galaxy.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Ismail Elfath blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
Mohammed El Munir for Los Angeles has been booked by Ismail Elfath and receives a first yellow card.
